column1: Melalan Airport (Indonesian: Bandar Udara Melalan) (IATA: MLK
column2: ICAO: WALE formerly WRLE) is an airport serving Melak
column3: a district in West Kutai Regency
column4: located in the province of East Kalimantan in Indonesia. Terminal Facilities The airport resides at an elevation of 330 ft (101 m) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 03/21 with an asphalt surface measuring 900 m (2
column5: 953 ft). Flight Destinations Currently there is an airline operate schedule commercial flights from this Airport to Datadawai and Samarinda. Airlines and destinations connecting to Melalan Airport: Airline Name Destination Susi Air Datadawai
column6: Samarinda Public Transportation Car and taxi: Various taxi services are provided by numerous service providers outside the arrival hall. Contact Information Bandar Udara Melalan Melak Desa Gemuhan Asa Kel. Barong Tongkok Kec. Barong Tongkok Kab. Kutai Barat Kalimantan Timur 75776 Indonesia
